my_favourite_bni_story: Artemisia's construction power team - a formidable mix of industry stalwarts convened regularly to discuss the team's progress and share insights and industry updates. Every Saturday, they held a conference call a sacrosanct ritual fueled by their collective ambition. During one such session, Ashish Jodhani - an expert in waterproofing, presented a specific challenge. And in an undeniable testimony to the power of networking, Kishan Patel - a skilled professional in plywood business, had the perfect solution to the challenge.! What seemed like a routine meeting instantly turned into a game-changer, as their collaboration unraveled a substantial business opportunity - amounting to 94 lacs. This however was just a tip of the iceberg.. As the team delved deeper, they discovered a promising pipeline of projects in the realm of crores..! This has indeed amplified their excitement and reinforcing the strength of Artemisia's collaborative prowess.
